lead_paragraph: A chance to reunite with new Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola and the lure of Premier League football made Nolito opt for a move to England over a return to Spanish champions Barcelona, the winger has said.

headline.print_headline: Lure of Guardiola Reunion Sealed Man City Move for Nolito
headline.main: Lure of Guardiola Reunion Sealed Man City Move for Nolito

snippet: A chance to reunite with new Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola and the lure of Premier League football made Nolito opt for a move to England over a return to Spanish champions Barcelona, the winger has said....
